description: In India, dal refers to a number of lentil-shaped legumes They are served with rice and curries, and are usually soupy, unlike this thick rendition, which resembles refried beans in consistency If you prefer a soupier dish, double the amount of liquid.
title: Spiced Brown Lentils With Yogurt
title_page: Spiced Brown Lentils With Yogurt Recipe - NYT Cooking
text: Variation: Curried Lentil Soup: Use 5 cups water. Increase the salt in Step 1, as you will not be reducing the liquid. Reduce the oil in Step 2 to 1 tablespoon, and saut√© the spices after the lentils have simmered for 30 minutes. Let them sizzle for 30 seconds, and remove from the heat. Add them to the lentils along with the salt, and simmer 15 minutes. Puree the soup coarsely with an immersion blender, taste and adjust seasonings. Serve garnished with a dollop of yogurt and a sprinkling of cilantro.
